title: Radioactive Man
description: Radioactive Man, hero of comics and television, makes it to the big screen for this origin story of his trusty sidekick, Fallout Boy.
altHero: superheroes Radioactive Man and Fallout Boy fight aliens on the moon

alt2: Radioactive Man and Fallout Boy hang upside down in a cage

alt4: Fallout Boy sits on a couch by himself
